text: @EricTrump It’s been well over 1 month since the last White House coronavirus press briefing, even though it’s killed 120,000 Americans & rages on b/c of your dad’s failings. Go help daddy change his adult diaper & stop w/ the political commentary you fraudulent grifting nothingberder
